plot: A TV reporter interviews a Tibetan Monk who claims he can create objects, and beings that other people can see by using intense meditation and concentration techniques
title: The Tulpa
plot_es: A TV reporter interviews a Tibetan Monk who claims he can create objects, and beings that other people can see by using intense meditation and concentration techniques
plot_en: A TV reporter interviews a Tibetan Monk who claims he can create objects, and beings that other people can see by using intense meditation and concentration techniques
